Name: team_size_must_be_at_least_5
Description: Team size must be a minimum of 5

Name: sprint_must_have_valid_end_date
Description: Ensure sprint end date is valid

Name: sprint_review_attendees_must_be_at_least_3
Description: Ensure at least 3 attendees in sprint review

Name: user_story_must_have_acceptance_criteria
Description: User Story must have defined acceptance criteria

Name: velocity_must_follow_trend
Description: Velocities must align with historical trends
